import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import authService from "../services/auth-service"; const NavComponent = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { authService.logout(); //清空localStorage window.alert("登出成功！現在您會被導向至首頁"); navigate("/"); }; return (
